Class
Description
ConfigLoader
Description for class ConfigLoader which finds and opens configuration to multiple sources.
ControlledShutdown
Control a threaded or non-threaded application's shutdown process.
ControlledShutdown.DebugMessageCallback
Callback interface for debug messages.
ControlledShutdown.IllegalApplicationState
Unchecked exception for calling startApplication or endApplication in the wrong order with the wrong prerequisite states.

Interface for DataAccess, agnostic to implementation.

DataAccessLayerResponse

Deprecated.
NodeMonitoring
This interface is designed to handle one way message passing to multiple nodes in a multi-node cluster of nodes including a heartbeat feature.
NodeMonitoringClient
NodeMonitoringClient talks to the NodeMonitoring implementation
NodeMonitoringFactory
Factory to create a message-based (network) node monitoring class using a heartbeat.
NodeStateChangeHandler
Functional interface for callback that is called when a remote node changes state (MISSING or ACTIVE).
PassThruFormatter
Deprecated.
PrimarySecondaryRole
Enum for the 2 possible roles.
PrimarySecondaryRoleChange
Defined callback for the Role changes as the cluster changes.
PrimarySecondaryServiceMonitor
Class for making a single node in a cluster the "Primary" node.
PropList
Class to store a list of properties.
PropMap
Class to store a dictionary of property name/value pairs.
PropStore
Class representing a Store of properies (maps/lists nested or flat).
PropStoreException
Exception thrown by any implementations of the PropStore.
PropStoreFactory
Static class to register and create PropStore derived implementations for property serialization.
PropStoreFactoryException
Thrown by the PropStoreFactory.getStore or PropStoreFactory.registerNewStore.
RedisException
Description for class RedisException
RedisProofOfLifeVariable
This creates variable on the redis server with a timeout value of twice the period (default 5000 ms).
RedisUniqueId
Class to retrieve a unique ID by name from a Redis server.
RemoteNodeState
Node states reported by the NodeStateChangeHandler callback.
Task
A Task that can be run as a process or as an isolated thread.
Task.Type
Possible types of task execution (Process=Default or Thread).
TaskMonitor
A monitor to "watch" Tasks for completion.
TaskMonitor.Callback
Functional interface for a completion callback for a task.
